title: When you play league of legends
body:
I must be on the wrong server
https://i.imgur.com/QHO5cBR.png

replies.body:
This discussion got out of hand, and as such, we'll be closing out further discussion moving forward. We'll work to increase responsitivity with our moderation actions moving forward, and we hope you'll be able to notice these changes. If you have any feedback regarding moderation, we welcome you to shoot us a message on the Miscellaneous sub-board. 

Thanks.

As much as it might seem like speaking in a different language may be to mask insults or incite miscommunication within the team, it's not exactly reportable. People shouldn't be FORCED to speak English.

I honestly just report use of any other language in game.

If i can't tell what your saying, i'm gonna assume your insulting me and give you a report.
That is seven different kinds of ducked up

I mean it's more often accurate then not.

Especially since most of them at least know broken English, which i prefer instead of full on trying to avoid me reading what you are saying.

Large majority of my high school class was at least bilingual. Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese were the most common, with some Korean, German, French, Hindi and even a few people who spoke Arabic.

And that was only in Brisbane. OCE is a largely multicultural region. The supported language is English because it’s the majority and they don’t have the resources to support more.

Who are we to deny people speaking their first language in their leisure time. Speaking a second language, even one you are reasonably fluent in is exhausting, I know this first hand. Why should they have to work three times as hard as anyone else just to play a video game? Especially in a scenario like OP shows where clearly others share the language?

You’re free to report who you wish of course, a false report will only get thrown out and no longer affects report weight, so if you have a vague inkling they might have been toxic you might as well. However to assume negativity isn’t fair to those players if it affects you behaviour/attitude towards them for the duration of the game.

>if it affects you behaviour/attitude towards them for the duration of the game

Which it doesn't, but hey lets keep assuming.

I'm already being called racist and shit, not to mention, having racial attacks towards Australians in this topic with no Riot action towards the person doing it.

Racism is apparently ok if it's done to Australians.

I doubt it was Seras' intention to make an assumption there, and I wouldn't say that *is* an assumption. It's more of a conditional statement. It would be an assumption if you were to replace the "if" with "because", as that excludes any other possibility.

I doubt any of the Rioters and/or volunteers want you (or anyone else) to think that racism is ok, because it's not. I can certainly understand that you'd likely be feeling insulted and perhaps "overlooked" by Riot. If you haven't already, you should use the report feature to report the racist comment you're referring to (I'll admit, I did this the moment I saw it, and I'm hoping you did too).

It *should* be dealt with appropriately, so long as it's being reported, though from what I understand, certain behaviours are taken with a bit more lenience on the boards than in-game, because of the community that exists here. Hopefully it will be dealt with soon enough.

I'd like to recommend that you take some time to calm down and reflect on how you feel and are behaving at the moment. You seem riled up, which could (perhaps already has) cause you to act in an inappropriate manner, putting you're boards access at risk, and creating unnecessary toxicity with other users. Allow yourself to come back to the discussion with a clear head, then you'll be able to debate your point without needlessly resorting to toxic behaviours.

BTW that post still isn't removed, racism is ok if it's at Australians.

And it's also being actively upvoted.

"don’t have the resources to support more"

billion dollar company doesnt have the resources? please.
Riot is a billion dollar company. Riot OCE is only a small part of that.

Dude not everything is about you. There could be numerous reasons why they're speaking in another language and your fucking reporting them for that. I honestly don't know what to say. There's no requirement to know English on this server and I hope that they ignore all your damn reports.

But again, i can't read it, so i have to assume.

Doesn't matter why when i can't understand it does it?

That's on you not on them. Not they're fault you can't speak there language. I honestly do not get you. You spend all your times on the forum complaining that riot don't ban trolls and then you report something like this.

It is on them for talking a language that i don't understand, on an english speaking server.

Fact is, i put it on Riot to translate and see if they are insulting me, because unfortunately copy and paste into google translate isn't a thing i can do in game.

You may have an issue with this, but it's up to me what i want to report.

How many times are people going to have to tell you. You don't have to speak English to play in OCE. It's not a fucking requirement. Reporting them for not speaking in English is the dumbest thing I've ever heard. Your reporting someone on the off chance they may have said something bad. That's freaking ridiculous

No one (I think) said you HAVE to speak English in order to play.
Its when they start speaking it or a little of it, then start spamming a different language.
Usually this happens when they died, or someone said something.

No one should be forced to speak English, in that case if they can't they should ask if someone speaks Japanese, Chinese, Koreans etc.

Or not speak at all if no one says "Yes" respectively.

----------------------

As someone said, if you go onto a different server, any of the Asian ones I would expect them to lean basic speaking terms.
I know a little of Japanese and Chinese.
But I would ask, anyone speak English if I played on those servers, if no, or no response, play with pings instead.
But I would assume that if I spammed English, calling them anything, or just saying stuff in general, I would hope that I do get a report.

As I said before, riot looks at it, see's nothing bad was said, and ignores it, or I was being incredibly racist or horrible and I get punished for it.

But that is what your saying if your gonna report anyone who's speaking another language. If you can pick out a few words because you know some of the language that's fine, your reporting them for what's being said. In this example your reporting them on the chance your being insulted. Christ they could be talking about the weather for all I know. Now spamming after dying is more likely to be abuse but it's not garunteed. It could be friendly banter. 

I understand what your saying about riot bring able to filter out the reports but there still gonna get reports. Which could count agaisnt if they do have a bad day and flame someone. Plus the automated system takes into account what people report. So if people are reported enough times for using certain phrases in another language they'll grt punished for it. Even when the same phrase in English would have been fine. Let's be honest Australians and Kiwis have a pretty relaxed attitude towards swearing and what not. Do you see where I'm coming from?

"people"

yeah 2 people, one who was actively being a racist, and another who is telling me that i can't report someone for something when i actively can and do.

Dude that was not racism. Racism is stuff like the White Australia policy, or using one of many many racial insults or I don't know reporting someone using another language, simply because there not using English.

>Your idiocy is appalling. I shouldn't expect more from Australians, seeing as the country is more inbred than Texas.

This isn't racism?

Just because it's towards white people doesn't make it not racism, but ok.

How is it on him, to learn there language on a primary English speaking server?
If I see people spamming the chat in a different language, I also report.

1: its nothing as riots language teams can actually read it and determine its not ban worthy.
or-
2: They were saying offensive shit in a different language hoping that it won't be detected. and they get reported/banned by riots language team.

I'm not saying he should learn there langauge. I'm saying it's ridiculous to report someone because you don't understand what there saying. English is not a requirement to play in OCE just because English is the primary language doesn't mean it's the only language. Reporting them on the off chance they insulted you just because you can't understand them is ridiculous.

You do realise there is more to the oceanic region than just Australia, right?

Oceania is a geographic region comprising Melanesia, Micronesia, Polynesia and Australasia.
It's an english speaking server, you should speak english, if your actively avoiding speaking the language that is common, then yes there is an issue.

>

Nowhere has Riot stated that this is an English speaking server. It's idiotic to make them speak English when they probably live in a country that hardly speaks it.

The real question stands, though. Why don't you learn their language?

Ok i want you to go to the top right, click where it says Oceania, notice how there is no other language sitting there?

That would be because it's an english speaking server.

And i shouldn't have to learn several different languages to find out if someone in league is insulting me.
Bluntly No...it is NOT an English language server.  That's your delusion.  Try to keep your rampant racism in check please.
When you climb on both korean and oce server xD
If you encounter this outside of game, you will encouter this ingame.
But we don't encounter this outside of the game.
Depend on where you live? Where i live people speak different langues all the times.

Like broken scripts says. There's no requirement to speak English on the oceanic server. I don't think there's a server where a particular language is required. Not to mention there are countries other than Australia that make up Oceania.

Just mute them and get on with playing.
Rocket surgery.

The majority language is english though. jsut like if i went on the chinese server id probably try my best to speak chinese. there is literally a server dedicated to chinese speaking people. and the Filipino, maybe we get the indos  and stuff, but its mainly Aus and NZ.
